attributes.action: Freeze Duty and Tax on Beer and Fuel and Replace the Captcha System with something readable
attributes.additional_details:
Firstly Freeze Duty and Tax on Beer at current levels. No more increases in Duty for the next 5 years.
Give normal working people and Pubs a break and let thing get back to normal.

Secondly Freeze Duty and Tax on Fuel at current levels. No more increases in Duty or Tax for the next 5 years.
Give normal working people and Businesses a break and let thing get back to normal.

Finally, make these e-petitions more usable and replace the stupid captcha verification system with something readable. This will also help visually impaired site users.
